rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception
rooms.description: A spacious entry area with a modern reception desk, built using locally available stone and wood finishes. The design features natural light through large windows on the east side for positive energy alignment.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living space with high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling glass doors that open to a garden, ensuring abundant natural light. Vastu principles dictate that the entrance is oriented toward east for auspicious energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with an integrated kitchenette area for informal dining experiences, designed with north-east orientation for balance and light.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated office space located in a quiet corner of the ground floor. The office is south-facing to maintain privacy while benefiting from ample natural light, as per Vastu guidelines for productivity and clarity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious guest room designed with a westward orientation to enhance relaxation. Features include a private balcony overlooking the garden.
